## volume variable

Returns the volume of given 3D shape. Returns 0 for all others.

Currently only implemented for:

- AABB - Sphere

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
volume: import("@thi.ng/defmulti").MultiFn1<IShape, number>
```
